additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 100 health, 1.25 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen and 8 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 100 health, 1.25 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen and 5 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 100 health, 1.25 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 24 mana, 0.1 mana regen and 5 attack damage.
name: Bracer
description: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
tips: For most non-strength heroes, it grants as much attack damage as a Wraith Band or Null Talisman.
